en.title_long_prefix: A quick snapshot of what drives me...

en.text:
A product-driven {{Software Engineer}} with around 3 years of experience in developing scalable enterprise-grade web applications and microservices. Proven expertise in {{Full-Stack Development}}, coupled with strong {{DevOps}} practices and {{Cloud Architecture}} skills.

I bring a solid grounding in {{Data Structures and Algorithms}}, applying them to build solutions that emphasize [[scalability]], [[concurrency]], and robust {{API design}} while maintaining clean {{Data Modeling}} and {{Distributed systems}}.

My approach is complemented by a strong commitment to [[software quality]], leveraging both testing methodologies and automated testing frameworks to ensure maintainability and reliability in production. Beyond technical expertise, I value clear [[communication]], attention to detail and effective [[teamwork]], and I bring a genuine passion for tackling sophisticated engineering challenges.

Seeking a challenging opportunity to leverage my skills and expand them far beyond the horizon.
